definitions.definition: A long and slender pipe or bag, made of cloth well pitched, or of leather, filled with powder , and used to communicate fire to mines , caissons , bomb chests, etc.
A fascine of more than ordinary length.

main_definition: ( mining , firearms ) A long and slender pipe or bag, made of cloth well pitched, or of leather, filled with powder , and used to communicate fire to mines , caissons , bomb chests, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( fortification ) A fascine of more than ordinary length.
